column5: Great trip, hundreds and hundreds of fish. Place was a bare-bones 3 cabin place on Indian Territory. LAC SEUL ADVENTURES
Caught some hooks in the face, too. Sucked.
How did you get the hook out?

My partner in the boat used a piece of braided line on on each barbed bend and a third line was tied to the eye of the hook. The hooks not stuck in face were cut off. I held the line tied to the eye and he yanked on the ones tied to the hooks. Popped right out.Had seen the how-to on some fishing show a long while back.
